name: Common
description: The most widely spoken language in the world, used for trade and diplomacy between different peoples.

name: Dwarvish
description: The language of the dwarves, characterized by its guttural sounds and complex grammar.

name: Elvish
description: A flowing, melodic language that sounds like music to those who don't speak it.

name: Giant
description: A harsh, guttural language that sounds like thunder and crashing rocks.

name: Gnomish
description: A language full of technical terms and complex descriptions, reflecting the gnomes' love of invention.

name: Goblin
description: A harsh, guttural language with many words for violence and few for peace.

name: Halfling
description: A warm, friendly language that sounds cheerful even when discussing serious matters.

name: Orc
description: A guttural language with many words for battle and conquest.

name: Abyssal
description: The language of demons and the Abyss, filled with words of corruption and evil.

name: Celestial
description: The language of angels and the Upper Planes, beautiful and harmonious.

name: Draconic
description: The language of dragons, ancient and powerful, with words that can shape reality.

name: Deep Speech
description: A language of the Far Realm, incomprehensible to most mortal minds.

name: Infernal
description: The language of devils and the Nine Hells, filled with legalistic terms and contracts.

name: Primordial
description: The ancient language of the elemental planes, with dialects for each element.

name: Sylvan
description: The language of the Feywild, musical and enchanting.

name: Undercommon
description: A trade language of the Underdark, combining elements of many other languages.

name: Druidic
description: A secret language known only to druids, used for their sacred rites and communication.

name: Thieves' Cant
description: A secret language of rogues and thieves, used to communicate without being understood by others.
